content.raw:
also, I noticed that this branch has a windows failure on its own

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=821)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/821/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/821/

~~~
test_config.h(90): error C2039: 'tr2': is not a member of 'std'
~~~

I think the [test/test_config.h.in](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/ign-transport7/test/test_config.h.in) file has been fixed in the `ign-transport7` branch. Can you backport the fix?
